content:
Apologies if this is not related, but I think it is likely what is being referred to is asking "can you think of anything that is not currently occurring?". 

The result is saying "well of course! I can think of tomorrow, or my past, or loved ones who are gone, or a person I might date if they accept my invitation in the future!". 

This is all to be realized as "my present thoughts". All experienced can be questioned as "is it really the past? Is it really the future?" It might seem trivial or semantic, but it is literal and integral to understanding the personal experience as "only now".
